page.h120: How to buy with an operator

page-1.h2: We'll teach you how to buy in the UK!
page-1.h5: Shopping in the UK is very easy
page-1.h6: English stores do not deliver to Russia, but this is not a problem. With OkeyPost you can buy at the best prices and save on delivery. We will receive your parcels, pack them securely and send them to your home.
page-1.h7: Getting an address for purchases in UK stores
page-1.h8: Okeypost will help you pretend to be an American and not overpay. To do this, you need to register in our service. After registration, you will have access to two addresses in England, which you can indicate when placing orders in online stores.
page-1.h9: Let's go shopping in online stores
page-1.h10: We select the necessary goods in stores in England. We pay, as usual, indicating the coordinates of one of the Okeypost warehouses as the delivery address. You can make purchases yourself or with our help. Here is a list of what you cannot buy.
page-1.h11: We monitor the movement of the parcel to the warehouse
page-1.h12: After placing an order, the store will send the tracking number of the parcel to your e-mail and send the items to our warehouse. After 5-7 days, the purchases will arrive to us, we will place them in a special storage facility assigned to your account.
page-1.h13: We pay for delivery and purchases are sent home
page-1.h14: We will notify you when your purchases arrive at the warehouse. You can order something else in other stores and send everything in one parcel (this is more profitable). Purchases will be stored for free for up to 30 days. When all goods have arrived at the warehouse, choose a delivery method, we will pack everything securely and send it to you, providing the tracking number.
page-1.h15: We receive the parcel and hurry to place a new order
page-1.h16: In about 2 weeks, the parcel will arrive at your home, at the order pick-up point or at the post office. We receive your purchases and rejoice :)
